section.title: v1.0, November 5, 2012
section.para: These release notes correspond to the Preview for Rackspace Service Registry.

section.title: Service Registration and Discovery
section.para: Register services in the registry and get notifications via the events feed when a service comes online or times out.

section.title: Notifications via the Events Feed
section.para: Events feed contains events which happened during a life-cycle of your account. Events include service coming online, service timing out, configuration value getting updated and configuration value getting removed.

section.title: Configuration Storage
section.para: Store configuration values (arbitrary key-value pairs) in the centralized place and get notifications via the event feed when a value is updated or removed.
